members.signatureAfterChange: protected void findSourceFiles(IResourceDelta sourceDelta, int segmentCount) throws CoreException
diff: +								// remove problems and tasks for a compilation unit that is being moved (to another package or renamed)
+								// if the target file is a compilation unit, the new cu will be recompiled
+								// if the target file is a non-java resource, then markers are removed
+								// see bug 2857 Renaming .java class with errors to .txt leaves errors in Task list (1GK06R3)

members.signatureAfterChange: protected boolean findSourceFiles(IResourceDelta sourceDelta, ClasspathMultiDirectory md, int segmentCount) throws CoreException
